name: Don't Push Me!
description:
My entry for Mini Ludum Dare #72 (Topic: elympics).

The train is about to leave and you have 1 minute to get all the passengers in.

How many passengers can you send off on time?

Android and WebGL version are coming in the next few days.

Leaderboard for the Mini LD Version can be found here: https://dollarone.games/elympics/leaderboards.html

Credits:

  • Graphics: @ohanhan
  • Music: My brother (42Kwei on Soundcloud)
  • Sound:
    • 魔王魂(Maoudamashii) [JP]
    • ポケットサウンド(Pocket Sound) [JP]
